description.@en:
Perhaps lost during an unfortunate carriage
  accident, during an intense battle, or in the jaws of a
  rabid animal, you are missing a foot. In its place is a wooden boot, which you must strap onto your leg to stand up straight. It makes a characteristic ‘CLUD’ sound as you walk, which has earned you a number of embarrassing nicknames.

effect.@en: You cannot Charge, Maneuver or Run with Movement Actions without spending an additional Action Point.
